annotations.description: The Golden Girls was one of the greatest, and most ahead of its time shows ever, let's honor my favorite ladies with a drink! *******************************...
annotations.title: What would the Golden Girls drink? | How to Drink

textContent:
.5 oz. -or- 15 ml. Lemon Juice
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. Drambuie
2 oz. -or- 60 ml. London Dry Gin
build in glass over ice and stir
Float a large amount of Angostura Bitters across the top

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Kj8gu_kRSpE
title: Rusty Anchor
